Header: Buddhist monks walk to bring stability to the country
Content: A walk with the participation of two thousand Buddhist monks was held with the intention of immediately bringing in stability to the motherland. The walk proceeded from the Sambuddha Vihare in Wijerama up to the Independence Square. It was organized by the Lankarakshaka Sangha Sabha. The Pledge for the Protection of the Motherland was released at the Independence Square. Members of the Maha Sangha including the Ven. Magalkande Sudattha Thera joined in the occasion.
